txt.en: 'My bow! You found it! Now I can get back to my job of feeding these fine folk.'

'Have you found my bow? It was gifted to me by my father, long ago.\n\n'I have never seen so few trees and such large expanses. I hear Rohan has huge fields as well. I should like to see them one day, but I feel more comfortable with tall trees around me.'
You should bring the stolen bow back to Hal Wolfscomb.\n\nHal is at camp in northern Tharbad in Cardolan.
Hal Wolfscomb has asked you to retrieve his bow, which was stolen by Orcs.\n\nThe Orc who stole Hal's bow is at Tharbad, in Cardolan.
Hal Wolfscomb came to Tharbad with the task of feeding Stonecrop's party, but without his bow, this hunter is unable to complete his duty.

'Hello there. My name is Hal Wolfscomb, and I travelled down from Bree with this company as their hunter. Itâ€™s my job to keep us supplied with fresh meat, but when the Orcs attacked they stole my bow. I could make a new one, but this land was stripped of its trees long ago, and besides it would take far too long. I heard you are going into the ruins. When you do, will you look for my bow?'
